List of all Heroes in

Silvernail

LANE, SNIPER

Grizzled hunter with a powerful crossbow and tripwires

Anka

LANE, ASSASSIN

An elusive and bursty assassin who strikes with a flurry of blades

KINETIC

LANE, MAGE

Nimble duelist wielding a powerful pulse cannon

KENSEI

LANE, JUNGLE, ASSASSIN

Kensei is an agile swordmaster who excels at fighting durable heroes

MALENE

LANE, MAGE

A form-swapping spellcaster who deals massive crystal damage with light and shadow abilities

TONY

JUNGLE, WARRIOR

Tony is a dwarven brawler who taunts and pummels enemies

VARYA

LANE, MAGE

Shocking valkyrie who chains massive damage across enemy teams

LORELAI

JUNGLE, PROTECTOR

Backline support, excelling at zone control and team utility

CHURN-WALKER

JUNGLE, WARRIOR

Churnwalker is a disruptor who throws multiple skillshot hooks, chaining victims to him.

REZA

JUNGLE, ASSASSIN

A fast, devastating fire mage with a demon netherform

GRACE

JUNGLE, PROTECTOR

A powerful paladin with a massive heal

BAPTISTE

JUNGLE, MAGE

Baptiste dictates battle by striking fear into the heart of his enemies. Reaping the souls of his opponents, he both sustains himself and empowers his attacks and abilities.

GRUMPJAW

JUNGLE, WARRIOR

Grumpjaw is a durable fighter, able to last in battles while maintaining stacks of his Living Armor through basic attacks. Grumpjaw can easily turn the tides of battle by devouring one of his enemies and briefly removing them from the fight.

IDRIS

JUNGLE, ASSASSIN

Idris shifts through battle, piercing his targets with his spear and chakrams. Whether building weapon, crystal, or a combination of the two, Idris brings extraordinary damage and agility to any fight.

FLICKER

JUNGLE, PROTECTOR

Flicker is a sneaky trickster able to disrupt foes with his debilitating abilities. Utilizing his stealth, Flicker can plunge deep into enemy lines causing mayhem or grant his team stealth to initiate on unsuspecting prey.

GWEN

LANE, SNIPER

Gwen moves swiftly across the map, picking off enemies from a distance. She can shake off negative effects inflicted by her enemies, turning the tables in her favor. Gwen is best played in the lane where she can earn gold and gear up for big fights.

BARON

LANE, SNIPER

Baron rains destruction on his opponents. No matter how he builds, he brings incredible range and powerful burst damage to any team.

SAMUEL

LANE, MAGE

Samuel is a dark mage who controls large areas with his abilities. Samuel is able to deal damage on the move, but he may be caught out of position if played too aggressively. He is well suited in the lane, able to bully his victim while draining health and energy to sustain himself.

LYRA

JUNGLE, PROTECTOR

Drawing upon her training as a Gythian battlemage, Lyra uses healing and protective magic to turn enemy positions into powerful zones for her allies. Her portals also allow her team to bypass these positions entirely, avoiding defenses and terrain.

LANCE

JUNGLE, PROTECTOR

Lance depends on both his courage and his wits to protect his allies. With his unique polearm-and-shield combat style, he breaks enemy lines and creates opportunities for his friends.

ALPHA

JUNGLE, WARRIOR

Alpha hunts and terminates her targets with ruthless precision. No longer bound to the rules of mortality, she engages in battle without fear or caution.

OZO

JUNGLE, ASSASSIN

Quick and nimble, Ozo leaps from hero to hero as he bounces around the battlefield. He is at home in the center of a chaotic fight where he can deal large amounts of area-of-effect damage.

REIM

JUNGLE, MAGE

Reim is a grumpy old winter mage who freezes everyone who crosses him. Though he moves slowly, he deals heavy damage to opponents while being surprisingly resilient himself.

KESTREL

LANE, SNIPER

Kestrel is an elite Stormguard archer who takes down targets from a distance. When building weapon, she deals rapid, sustained damage and uses stealth to find better footing when enemies get too close.

BLACK-FEATHER

LANE, ASSASSIN

Blackfeather is a striking duelist who pierces the hearts of his opponents. When building weapon items, he becomes a powerful assassin.

PHINN

JUNGLE, PROTECTOR

Phinn is an unstoppable tank who brings the fight to him. He pairs incredibly well with other heroes who don't back down from battle.

SKYE

LANE, SNIPER

Skye is a swift sniper able to dance at the edge of fights or dive deep into the enemy backline to kill key targets.

RONA

JUNGLE, WARRIOR

Rona is a deadly berserker who is always ready to leap into battle. She holds her own in melee combat, unleashing enormous damage.

FORTRESS

JUNGLE, PROTECTOR

This Halcyon Well guardian is a snarling, frightening sight in the jungle. He stalks prey, closes in with teammates, flanks targets and creates challenging, multi-front confrontations.

JOULE

JUNGLE, WARRIOR

Joule is a hardened front-line fighter with built-in defensive plating.

ARDAN

JUNGLE, PROTECTOR

Ardan is a damage-soaking protector who dramatically changes the landscape of teamfights. Able to rescue friends from certain death and turn lost battles around

SKAARF

LANE, MAGE

Skaarf blazes his way through the fold, incinerating everything in his path.

TAKA

JUNGLE, ASSASSIN

Taka weaves through the battlefield, eliminating targets with his switchblades. He lives on the knife's edge, compensating for fragile defenses with agility and stealth.

KRUL

JUNGLE, WARRIOR

Krul is a jungle nightmare who dominates in 1v1 duels. Able to absorb massive amounts of damage and recover large portions of health, Krul can bring the pain and survive a beating.

SAW

LANE, SNIPER

SAW has arguably the highest damage potential in the game ... but at the huge expense of mobility. Excellent at sieging important locations, SAW zones, slows and damages with Suppressing Fire.

PETAL

LANE, SNIPER

Petal plants seeds that slowly heal her and her friends. She can grow these seeds into minions that fight alongside her, and she can blow them up to obliterate vulnerable targets.

GLAIVE

JUNGLE, WARRIOR

Glaive is a devastating powerhouse, instantly dashing into the action and knocking enemies into danger. His damage is devastating, but he is vulnerable to slippery opponents.

KOSHKA

JUNGLE, ASSASSIN

Koshka is an in-your-face assassin adept at getting the kill and then getting out. She should focus on assassinating weak targets and locking down the most lethal enemy.

ADAGIO

JUNGLE, PROTECTOR

Adagio can heal. He can amplify damage. He can stun and nuke the entire enemy team. This master manipulator of large-scale battles brings shines through area-of-effect damage and team-saving abilities.

RINGO

LANE, SNIPER

Ringo is often played as the primary damage dealer for his team. He can shoot at blinding speeds and finish off fleeing enemies with an epic fireball that follows foes across the battlefield.

CATHERINE

JUNGLE, PROTECTOR

Catherine brings the most reliable stun and disruption skills to teamfights and ganks. Hard to kill and great at chasing, she can secure kills and turn around fights that would otherwise be lost.

CELESTE

LANE, MAGE

Celeste lights the way for her team, calling upon her stars for both artillery and long-range reconnaissance. Though fragile, she is well-suited to fighting from the furthest edges of battle.

VOX

LANE, SNIPER

Vox is a mobile sniper with a high-energy playstyle, able to quickly and frequently dash around the battlefield. Vox deals significant damage either to a single target or to groups of enemies depending on his build.
